text.text: You are disgusted by the sketchy people of this world.
Vampires, sectarians, mafia, rebellion and criminals included.
Honest people work their asses of, only for those people to ruin everything and take the spoils of war.
You are waiting for the perfect moment to cancel out some of this disgrace.
☑️ TASK: Justice in your own hands
You are to kill whoever is contributing to the evil in this world.
But first, you have to find your trusted dagger that you left in the tavern some time ago...
